definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: The Party cannot live and develop if it isolates itself from the non-party masses.
sentences.chinese: 黨脫離了非黨羣衆就不能存在和發展。

sentences.english: Without this information, an insured nonmember bank is unable to identify suspicious transactions.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有這個信息，銀行保險非黨無法查明可疑交易。

sentences.english: What reason can we then have for not co-operating with non-Party people?
sentences.chinese: 我們有什麼理由不和非黨人員合作呢？
